title: 820-3662 No power - no charger light
message:

I've tried swapping and resoldering the ISL at least twice... at one point there was voltage on PPBUS_g3H... it seems if I move a charger from working to this board I get a green light intermittently on charger. All resistors around 7100 measure good.

title: 820-3662 No power - no charger light
message:
Post diode mode to ground at F7140/41.
If good, change C7125.

title: 820-3662 No power - no charger light
message: Voltage drops on both F7140/1 were .446V. Swap C7125. Still 0V @ PPBUS_G3H. Seem to be getting a green on charger more consistently but again had to connect it to working device first to get green light with this board.

title: 820-3662 No power - no charger light
message:
Forget that kind of Magsafe swap between two boards; is normal behavior.

Did you try another DCIN board?
Post U7000 voltages and check continuity from its pin 5 to central pin of Magsafe.

title: 820-3662 No power - no charger light
message: geez DCin board was no bueno. And my charger sketched out apparently. I had zero on everything haha. So green to orange light on charger wo battery and no fan spin.

title: 820-3662 No power - no charger light
message:
Which is the exact PPBUS_G3H voltage?
Is the battery charging?
Do you get 3V3_S5?
Are you using original 60/85W Magsafe charger?
